message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  Let's see if you're up for it.
That wasn't fair, Alice. How about a more realistic split? 60/40 seems reasonable.
Okay, 60/40 isn't quite right.  I'll offer 65/35.  Let's try to be more reasonable here.
This is getting us nowhere, Alice. Let's meet in the middle - 55/45.
